title: Cinderhulk and Sunfire do stack
body: I've read that they're not supposed to stack, but I wondered how they'd function together since their passives while having the same name are actually different. I expected Sunfire Cape to take priority over Cinderhulk until Cinderhulk's damage eventually passed Sunfire's, and then it'd switch. Instead what I got was 80+ damage ticks. Try it for yourself. Things to note when you do try is sometimes the damage does not occur at the same time, so you'll get rapid smaller ticks, and also don't forget to autoattack so that Cinderhulk begins stacking.
